title: Recharge problem
body: Why is the RP not debited after the recharge?

replies.body:
Could you be more specific? Did you purchase RP and it didn't appear on your account straight away? If so, try restarting your client as this usually fixes things. Failing that wait 24 hours and see then, and if not then, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If that's not your issue, you'll have to give a few more details as I'm afraid I'm not sure what you mean.
